p.span:
FJH students:
Please check in with Mrs. Garcia's Google Hangouts. I send out daily messages and information for students. It is also a great way to communicate with me and I can also forward messages to teachers. I am here to support all my FJH students and parents. I miss you guys terribly ‚ù§ Lil Bucks Big Pride!

p.span:
Attention FHS Senior Class:
We will have a discussion tomorrow over graduation at 11:00 am through google hangouts. Please check your email. We really would like to hear from you. Hope to see you on our virtual meeting.

div.class: cff-item cff-link-item cff-box cff-shadow author-freer-isd cff-700558203300483 cff-new

p.span:
Good afternoon,
The City of Freer has informed Freer ISD that the daytime curfew for school aged students has been extended until the end of the academic school year, May 29, 2020. This daytime curfew is from 8:00 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. daily when school should be in operation. Please refer to the academic calendar at www.freerisd.org to access the 2019-20 academic calendar.
Thank you
Conrad Cantu

div.p: Freer ISD and CACOST have partnered to bring a world class educational experence to the students of Freer ISD. Offering full day pre-k 3 and pre-k 4 classes fully staffed with two teachers to ensure every student has the opprutunity to learn in a warm and nurturing environment.¬†¬†
